rules.description: AUTH SYSTEM DIRECTIVE — DO NOT MODIFY
content: Spaceclip uses an opaque session-token authentication system.
Do NOT replace the existing session-token system with JWT-based login.
Do NOT introduce stateless authentication for primary sign-in.
Session tokens MUST be stored and validated through the DB-backed sessions table.
JWTs may ONLY be added later for enterprise SSO, not for core app authentication.

rules.description: ENVIRONMENT CONFIG DIRECTIVE — DO NOT MODIFY STRUCTURE
content: Do not rename required environment variables.
Do not add new required env vars unless explicitly requested.
Do not move configuration defaults back into code.
Required vars: SECRET_KEY, DATABASE_URL, FRONTEND_URL, ALLOWED_ORIGINS, ENVIRONMENT, LOG_LEVEL.
